Job.Description: She will clean the building, as filth will put off some customers.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to clean during the ${shift} shift.

Message.Name: shift.bad
Message.Text: She spilled a bucket of something unpleasant all over herself.
Message.Group:
While cleaning a bedroom, she put her hand right in a disgusting sticky patch.
It was her duty to stop and lick it clean.
She wouldn't carry on until she had thoroughly washed her hands.
Message.Text: She did not like cleaning the brothel today.
She walked into a room early, surprising the customer and landing her with some accidental 'crossfire'.
An impatient group of customers got bored of waiting and roughly tried to 'use' her. She had to hide in a janitor closet for a while.

Message.Name: shift.good
Message.Text: She cleaned the building while humming a pleasant tune.
She had a great time working today.
A waiting customer chatted with her as she worked, and even helped her out a little.

Message.Name: event.nap
Message.Text: ${name} finished her cleaning early, so she found an empty room and took a nap.

Message.Name: event.chat
Message.Text: ${name} finished her cleaning early, so she hung out around the brothel chatting with staff and patrons.

Message.Name: event.sports
Message.Text: ${name} finished her cleaning early, so she spent some time training and getting herself fitter.
